summary:
Experience: Managing / Leading people and business together
Business: Retail APPLE Market NL/BE, APPLE Den Hague - Nederlands
Function: Store Leader
Business: Retail NORNORM, is a subscription-based furnishing model based on circular business model for workspace solutions.
Function: Customer Success, Project Implementation Manager (NL/BE)
Business: Retail APPLE Market NL/BE, APPLE Brussel - Belgium.
Function: Senior Manager
Business: Retail IKEA, IKEA NL, Inter-IKEA Systems BV, IKEA Russia, IKEA Poland.
Functions: Store Manager, Competence-Learning and Development Manager, Communication&Interior Design Manager, Project-Coordinator, Project Manager, Support-Manager. All functions in different Stores + Service Office
Location: National and International

Specialties: 
- performing & deliver management. 
- project manager, coordinating proces and finding solutions.
- leading, coaching and developing people and business growth
- building strong relationships across teams and other stakeholders.
- commercial thinker, result oriented with a creative background.
- thinking in terms of motivation, diversity, flexibility and adapt to changes.
- knowing how to get people on board by clarifying and inspire.
- naturally focused on team building, collaboration and communication.
- having a direction, vision, putting ideas into practice.

profile_positions.title: Store Leader APPLE Retail, APPLE Den Hague, Nederlands

profile_positions.description: This is Works/ NORNORM is a start-up subscription-based furnishing model based on circular business model for workspace solutions. The start-up is independent but IKEA is still on board as an investor. The ambition is to extend the lifespan of furniture to a refurbished service for offices.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Project Implementation Manager BENELUX

profile_positions.description:
Senior Manager - team of 130 people - 2 Senior Manager - 1 Store Leader - 5 Managers 
-People strategy coordinator: performance management, internal talent movements, follow-up on the new learning platform to develop skills and knowledge, time away management, employee relations, workforce planning, leadership development.
-Rebuild and structured communication efforts for leadership team for on site and remote teams.
- COVID-19, crisis management for employee well-being.
- Transition manager from coaching on site to virtual coaching.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager APPLE Retail, APPLE Brussel, Belgium

company.name: Service office IKEA Poland/ IKEA bydgoszcz

profile_positions.company: Service office IKEA Poland/ IKEA bydgoszcz
profile_positions.description:
Training: Inter IKEA Systems B.V. Store Manager Training Program 2015

-Recruit, Planning and commercial build-up ( 10th of July) and neigthbours day (21 of July) special for neighbors and coworkers ( no selling!) test opening 23th of July,  grand opening IKEA Bydgoszcz store 5th of August 2015, 09:45 open!
-people in the business: FY2018: 50% of the coworkers are flexible in different departments. Multiskilling, cross competence, flexibility business need.
-develop leadership: project leader training, PEER group coaching, co-workers GROW program, TeamLeader program, status meetings, store operational meeting, business financial meeting, Co-workers breakfast
-store operational standards: organize test reviews, official reviews 
-people plan: competence profile for every functions, goal letter, people year cycle and teamscan, competence mapping tool
- people KPI: illness/ holiday/ over hours, training budget, competence staircase, succession planning
- business plan together with SO matrix partners and other 10 stores
- commercial: online and offline sales, call and deliver, click and deliver, CDC, commercial calendar, marketing in 3 cities, visitation plan, cooperate with tradition on the market, public transport, direction signs, billboards, working with different scenario planning
- result: in the end of the 3th business year 1of the 4/10 stores delivered on the goals for FY2018, 126% bonus for all coworkers, best sales index 110%, all reviews above 75% for 3 years. 
-review: FY2018:sustainability:86%, Facility:86%, BN:84%,CMT:logistic:80%/comin:76%/furniture:77%/market hall:82%, FOOD:90%, ARSQuality:91%,SecCheck:99%. FY2019:FOOD:96%
profile_positions.title: Store Manager IKEA Bydgoszcz, IKEA Poland

profile_positions.description:
Competence Learning and Development Manager /Deputy Country Communication&Interior Manager
Working in service office responsible for 14 stores, for creative teams/ CMT
Training: Six Sigma
-Retail foundation: planned Functional Review Com&In + follow-up reviews in 2012/13/14.
-Beautiful Basics: Com&In HUB, Internet- tools for all co-workers, safety shoes
-master plan for projects/SISAN and expansion and resources 
-support and visit stores
-develop coaches for now Com&In managers 
Result: IKEA Omsk Com&In Review 62% FY2012, after 6 months follow-up: 76% FY2013
Result: IKEA N.Novgorod Com&In Review 61% FY2013, after 6 months follow-up: 89% FY2014
Conclusion main potentials: work consistent from strategic and operational approach. Layout as a Commercial Tool, work with First Impression, Commercial Lighting, Competence and Leadership.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Country Communication and Interior Design Manager, Learning + Development Mgr IKEA Russia SO

profile_positions.description:
Inter IKEA Systems: international Concept Centre IKEA Delft
-Support, coach, lead, train and coordinate projects, competence, training in the 4 task of Concept Centre IKEA Delft
-plan, follow-up and evaluate the quality of projects/ trainings/ resources 
- 'on the job' coach for new Creative Managers (Santo Domingo, Finland, Norway, Bangkok)
- project-assistant for New Life in Market Hall
- testhost for new textile range presentation (project Kvartal curtains)
- project leader in cooperation with Spanje/UK/Italy/Sweden/Delft the competence mapping tool for Com&In
- project leader for ComIn specialist training program
-MS projects Basics
-IIS B.V. leadership programme training 2008-2011
-participate in the Business plan store- department/directions IIS

IKEA Delft:
- supporting, coaching, coordinating, analysing, planning, training and recourses of co-workers base on the 4 tasks of IKEA Delft
- checking and evaluating the quality of projects and resources
- member of the MT-team/CMT team
- develop and working with business plan, sales objectives, 4 tasks and yearly commercial activity calendar and priorities 
-work with appraisal, illness and holiday rate, trainings budgets 
- coach in re-integration process
- involved in the business direction of Com- In IIS
profile_positions.title: Support Manager; Communication & Interior Design Manager Inter IKEA Systems B.V. IKEA Delft

profile_positions.description:
- new store, volume store
-leading and coaching a team of 40 people: Visual Merchandisers, Interior Designers, Furniture Builders, Carpenters, Graphic Communicators and Freelancers
- safe guarde and develop the IKEA Concept, the shopping experience in IKEA Concept Centre IKEA Delft.
- support inter IKEA systems BV, all external franchisees worldwide with training and recourses for projects world wide by know-how and show-how
- developing and working with the IKEA Business Plan for store and inter IKEA systems, roadmap, sales objectives and yearly commercial activity calender and priorities
- member of the MT-team/CMT
- work with people year plan: appraisal system, illness rate/ holiday and succession planning, yearly training budget and Competence staircase
- build-up and opening the New IKEA store Delft
profile_positions.title: Deputy Manager; Communication & Interior Design Manager Inter IKEA Systems B.V. IKEA Delft

- rebuilding the Market Hall
